org.apache.hama.bsp

Interface PartitioningRunner.RecordConverter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PartitioningRunner.DefaultRecordConverter
    Enclosing class:
    PartitioningRunner

    public static interface PartitioningRunner.RecordConverter
    This record converter could be used to convert the records from the input format type to the sequential record types the BSP Job uses for computation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Should return the Key-Value pair constructed from the input format.

      void setup(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf) 

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        void setup(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)

      • convertRecord

        KeyValuePair<org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> convertRecord(KeyValuePair<org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> inputRecord,
                                                                                      org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
                                                                                        throws IOException
        Should return the Key-Value pair constructed from the input format.
        Parameters:
        inputRecord - The input key-value pair.
        conf - Configuration of the job.
        Returns:
        the Key-Value pair instance of the expected sequential format. Should return null if the conversion was not successful.
        Throws:
        IOException
